channel.title: SWS: MoonPunk (Saturdays in February)
channel.description:
![](upload://9tQrrSt770j1frCbMIRWosNBD55.jpeg) *"You can't defeat Warlord Zsinj!"* is a bunch of poodoo! There are literally hundreds of ways to take down an oppressive regime! MoonPunk is filled with them.
MoonPunk is a standalone political action Powered by the Apocalypse roleplaying game for 3-7 people. Play as punks on the moon of Belthu fighting the good fight against oppression. Use subversive action to take down The Empire, spread the truth about corruption, protest the corporate, or just punch some stormtroopers.
So sew on some patches, spike up your hair, and turn it up to 11. The show's about to start.
----------------------------------- This game is part of the ongoing Star Wars Saturdays series. The time setting is *after* the end of Episode VI of the Star Wars movie series (that's *Return of the Jedi* ) when the Empire is falling and the Alliance to Restore the Republic is taking control in fits and starts.
Characters and settings created in this miniseries will exist in the SWS canon for future miniseries and added to our wiki (https://starwarssaturdays.miraheze.org/wiki/Main_Page).
**CW: Violence, Imperial power abuse, violence. Strong emotional ties.** **System** : *Powered by the Apocalypse* **Duration** : Four 3 hour sessions **Breaks** : 1 mid-point break per session (10 mins) **Venue** : GM’s Zoom **Recording** : Yes, but made public only if consent by all the players **Attendance** : Joining all sessions is ideal but not required. You must RSVP to each session you wish to attend. **Safety** : Lines & Veils, X-card, and open door policy. Tools can be changed to suit the players. This game will follow the [Gauntlet Community Code of Conduct](https://www.gauntlet-rpg.com/community-code-of-conduct.html).
[date=2021-02-06 time=10:00:00 format="LLLL" timezone="America/New_York"] → [date=2021-02-06 time=13:00:00 format="LLLL" timezone="America/New_York"] [Session 1](https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-MNYmLs0WEZIR3rTpFgX) [date=2021-02-13 time=10:00:00 format="LLLL" timezone="America/New_York"] → [date=2021-02-13 time=13:00:00 format="LLLL" timezone="America/New_York"] [Session 2](https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-MNYmNfa7TrGy1HVF7sv) [date=2021-02-20 time=10:00:00 format="LLLL" timezone="America/New_York"] → [date=2021-02-20 time=13:00:00 format="LLLL" timezone="America/New_York"] [Session 3](https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-MNYmPU0RxtgBMD1uHlT) [date=2021-02-27 time=10:00:00 format="LLLL" timezone="America/New_York"] → [date=2021-02-27 time=13:00:00 format="LLLL" timezone="America/New_York"] [Session 4](https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-MNYmRIVVCW5bZBt2fTz)

item.title: SWS: MoonPunk (Saturdays in February)
item.dc:creator: @RichRogers
item.description:
@RichRogers wrote:


“You can’t defeat Warlord Zsinj!” is a bunch of poodoo! There are literally hundreds of ways to take down an oppressive regime! MoonPunk is filled with them.

MoonPunk is a standalone political action Powered by the Apocalypse roleplaying game for 3-7 people. Play as punks on the moon of Belthu fighting the good fight against oppression. Use subversive action to take down The Empire, spread the truth about corruption, protest the corporate, or just punch some stormtroopers.

So sew on some patches, spike up your hair, and turn it up to 11. The show’s about to start.

This game is part of the ongoing Star Wars Saturdays series. The time setting is after the end of Episode VI of the Star Wars movie series (that’s Return of the Jedi ) when the Empire is falling and the Alliance to Restore the Republic is taking control in fits and starts.

Characters and settings created in this miniseries will exist in the SWS canon for future miniseries and added to our wiki (https://starwarssaturdays.miraheze.org/wiki/Main_Page).

CW: Violence, Imperial power abuse, violence. Strong emotional ties.
System : Powered by the Apocalypse
Duration : Four 3 hour sessions
Breaks : 1 mid-point break per session (10 mins)
Venue : GM’s Zoom
Recording : Yes, but made public only if consent by all the players
Attendance : Joining all sessions is ideal but not required. You must RSVP to each session you wish to attend.
Safety : Lines & Veils, X-card, and open door policy. Tools can be changed to suit the players. This game will follow the Gauntlet Community Code of Conduct.

Saturday, February 6, 2021 3:00 PM → Saturday, February 6, 2021 6:00 PM Session 1
Saturday, February 13, 2021 3:00 PM → Saturday, February 13, 2021 6:00 PM Session 2
Saturday, February 20, 2021 3:00 PM → Saturday, February 20, 2021 6:00 PM Session 3
Saturday, February 27, 2021 3:00 PM → Saturday, February 27, 2021 6:00 PM Session 4
